description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
year the data point was obtained
month the data point was obtained
day of the month the data point was obtained
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/orangutan
presentation of the experiment to the ape participants - usually numerical

two different quantities of liquid (juice: 20 ml and 50 ml) or discrete (cereals/raisins: 2 and 5 pieces) were transferred from a pair of identical clear cups into a pair of opaque cups (same) or an opaque cup and an opaque tube (different)

large cup (lc) trial- larger quantity was transferred into the cup while the smaller was transferred into the tube / large tube (lt) trial- combination of the quantities and the shapes of the containers was reversed
amount chosen in the 1st choice - smaller (20 ml or 2 pieces)/ larger (50 ml or 5 pieces)
amount chosen in the 2nd choice - smaller (20 ml or 2 pieces)/larger (50 ml or 5 pieces)
container chosen in the 2nd choice - cup/tube
